Package teapot_rocket.utils

package teapot_rocket.utils
This package contains utility classes and helper components used in rocket simulations and related applications.

The classes in this package provide: - Custom classes, for passing data. - Common utility functions for input validation and handling. - Enumerations for defining various types and states. - Implementations of EventBus.

    Description
    teapot_rocket
     
    teapot_rocket.utils.enums
    This package contains all enums.

    This package contains custom exceptions.
    teapot_rocket.utils.implementations
    This package contains implementations.
    teapot_rocket.utils.interfaces
    This package contains interfaces, which are extended by Components.
    teapot_rocket.components
    Provides classes for modeling rocket components and assemblies.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ComponentBase
    The ComponentBase class represents the basic attributes of a component used in rocket construction.
    RequirementHandler
    The RequirementHandler class provides utility methods for checking requirements on various types of input values commonly used in rocket component definitions.
    Vector
    The Vector class is used to store a vector in 3D space.
